text: Ezɨ Atrivim Ahas kamaghɨn Uria mɨgei, “Nɨ zurara ofa damuamin dughiaba, nɨ ofa gamir dakozir igiar kamra mangɨ. Nɨ mɨzarazibar ofan bar isia mɨghɨribar amuva, guaratɨzibar wit tuer ofabar amu. Egh nɨ atrivim bagh ofa damuva, egh uaghan gumazamiziba bar me bagh ofa bar amu. Kar ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba ko wit tuer ofaba. Egh nɨ gumazamiziba bagh ofan igharazibar amu, kar wain inger ofaba. Egh nɨ asɨzibar ghuziba bar ada inigh ofa damu, egh da kavamangɨtɨ, da ofa gamir dakozir igiar kamra irɨ. Ezɨ brasɨn ingarizir ofa gamir dakozim, kar nan bizimra. Kɨ an ofabar amu egh Godɨn azangsɨghtɨ, a na mɨkɨmtɨ bizir kɨ damuasa nɨghnɨziba kɨ dar amuam.”
